00021 __device void svm_node_camera(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint out_vector, uint out_zdepth, uint out_distance)
00022 {
00023     float distance;
00024     float zdepth;
00025     float3 vector;
00026 
00027     Transform tfm = kernel_data.cam.worldtocamera;
00028     vector = transform_point(&tfm, sd->P);
00029     zdepth = vector.z;
00030     distance = len(vector);
00031 
00032     if (stack_valid(out_vector))
00033         stack_store_float3(stack, out_vector, normalize(vector));
00034 
00035     if (stack_valid(out_zdepth))
00036         stack_store_float(stack, out_zdepth, zdepth);
00037 
00038     if (stack_valid(out_distance))
00039         stack_store_float(stack, out_distance, distance);
00040 }
00041 
00042 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
